name: @ic-reactor/parser
description: A parser for the DFINITY Candid language
author: b3hr4d

scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn build:web && yarn build:node && yarn build:bundler
scripts.build:web: npx wasm-pack build --release --target web --out-dir dist/web --out-name index
scripts.build:node: npx wasm-pack build --release --target nodejs --out-dir dist/nodejs --out-name index
scripts.build:bundler: npx wasm-pack build --release --target bundler --out-dir dist/bundler --out-name index
